channel.title: Confused
channel.description: I have this pking source where you can spawn and pk! but, it doesnt let the owners spawn money or items so how would i allow owners/admin anything and players cant spawn coins or for free.

item.title: Confused
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“Lil wayne fan, post:3, topic:424607”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=527265.msg3843107#msg3843107 date=1323399054]

I have this pking source where you can spawn and pk! but, it doesnt let the owners spawn money or items so how would i allow owners/admin anything and players cant spawn coins or for free.

just change the requirements
if playerRights =< blablabla
else if playerrights < blabla
[/quote]
I know, but the way other players get item is also spawn…
So i cant just change it becasue thats how non-staff get items[/quote]
post the code

Read full topic
